WRITING.TEXT:
666
You are a great poster and a generous man.
[This is the best thing I have seen in a while](https://www.reddit.com/r/pcmasterrac/top/)
Added you!
Theese da best sobredeet I evar fond in mah lif.
184,260,000 right now.
All you need is some RGB now.
Paying thousands of dollars for a PC is better than paying to use the internet I have already paid for.
A GTX 750 ti . Bought in march 2014. Gonna be upgrading soon :)

You are a diamond my friend. No one can break you.
I hope that is positive enough.
I want to thank Hidekata Miyazaki for giving us such amazinh games.
I'll love any of those games to be honest. :)

Also one helpful step can be that search for stores in your locality or city. I've often found that the prices are, if not much, a little cheaper.
Just do an extensive research and then buy your parts.
You need special items for the DLC doors to open. They act like a key. Keep going with rest of the game and you will find all of them eventually.
[This album is equally brilliant btw!](https://wall.alphacoders.com/by_sub_category.php?id=233166)
I too am searching for the artist. Haven't found him/her yet.
Could you post a link to the a full res picture? I am a big fan of that background but can't find it anywhere.
This is my current favorite : http://imgur.com/a/7MSlD
Will check it out. Thanks
All of this . Yes.
Please do tell me where I could get all these. Seems like a killer deal.
I may. But I need the PC for game development and music production too.

Well I have decided to wait till March as Ryzen is believed to launch by February end. As for the CSGO I don't play much of it anyway. My main focus is the Dark Souls franchise. Also I am into game development, so I will need a system powerful enough to handle Unity Unreal engines.

WRITING.TITLE: Gaming rig for approx 1 Lakh.
WRITING.TEXT:
Well, I live in Pune. What would your recommended build be? For approximately 1 lakh rupees. I mostly play Dark Souls 1, 2, 3 and CS:GO. But I casually play other games too. I game at 1080p. Also I'll like to future proof my rig. Thanks for your input.
Edit : Excluding the monitor ofcourse.
Link disabled due to traffic :(

WRITING.TITLE: Found this amazing Dark Souls video by ThePruld. Feels overload. I swear I am not crying, there's just something in my eye. ;(

WRITING.TEXT: It's great on it's own too. It has a tragic yet heroic vibe to it.
i just realised it doesn't ship with a cooler. Thanks for your help.
Any specific reason for that?
Could you please tell me why?

WRITING.TITLE: Confused between Zotac GTX 1070 AMP! Extreme edition and MSI GTX 1070 Sea Hawk EK X.
WRITING.TEXT:
Which one do you guys think I should choose?
My build looks something like this :

Last week of January probably .

WRITING.TITLE: Need help with being better at PVP.
WRITING.TEXT:
So the other day I was at the arena. I use a greatsword build as I enjoy it the most.
I came up against a player with a greatsword. He was very good. Better than me at least. I ended up being matched with him around 4-5 times. He always won. So I sent him a friend request on Steam and praised him for his skill.
He gave me a suggestion of playing PVP "unlocked". Also whatever PVP videos I watch most of them the player plays unlocked. Is there a benefit to play unlocked? I tried it and naturally got rekt.
Also I am very bad at parrying. Any tips for that too?
Thank you for your time.
It does happen sometimes. But you could always message them and help them out by explaining things you know.

Very good Skeleton !
I feel though you should have done your first playthrough without summons. Solaire is fine but other players are sometimes too overpowered. I'm sad you missed the feeling of being stuck on a boss for 4 days and then beating it . Try summonless in NG+.
This has inspired me. I will now go and git gud at parrying.
I had the same problem too. Replacing the RAM fixed it.
